ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: LC50; Species: Bufo americanus (American toad, tadpole); Conditions: static, 20-24 °C, pH 7.6-8.1, hardness 90-115 mg/L; Concentration: 7.16 ug/L (95% Confidence Levels: 5.39-9.34 mg/L); Exposure was initiated 2-6 hr after spawning and continued to 4 days post-hatching. Hatching times varied between 3 and 4 days, therefore, exposure varied between 7 and 8 days.

LC50; Species: Bufo fowleri (Fowler's toad, tadpole); Conditions: static, 20-24 °C, pH 7.6-8.1, hardness 90-115 mg/L; Concentration: 27.72 ug/L (95% Confidence Levels: 21.77-35.08 mg/L); Exposure was initiated 2-6 hr after spawning and continued to 4 days post-hatching. Hatching times varied between 3 and 4 days, therefore, exposure varied between 7 and 8 days.

Hatching times varied between 3 and 4 days, therefore, exposure varied between 7 and 8 days.
